imdb.plot outline: Documentary series featuring the recipients of the 2010 Minerva Awards: Oprah Winfrey, Sandra Day O'Connor, Sister Terry Dodge, Oral Lee Brown, and Carolyn Blashek. Created by California First Lady Maria Shriver in 2004, The Minerva Awards have become the country's most prestigious awards given to women "who serve on the front-lines of humanity," celebrating their extraordinary legacies of service and contributions to California, the nation and the world.
imdb.title: The Minerva Awards 2010
plot: Documentary series featuring the recipients of the 2010 Minerva _Awards_ (qv): Oprah Winfrey, Sandra Day O'Connor, Sister Terry Dodge, Oral Lee Brown, and Carolyn Blashek. Created by California First Lady Maria Shriver in 2004, The Minerva _Awards_ (qv) have become the country's most prestigious awards given to women "who serve on the front-lines of humanity," celebrating their extraordinary legacies of service and contributions to California, the nation and the world.::Big Life Films
